items.sentence: I wonder whether or not Tom is doing what he\'s supposed to be doing.
Early to bed and early to rise makes a man healthy, wealthy and wise.
I wanted to earn some money, so I worked part time three days a week.
Tom could tell by the look on Mary\'s face that she was very excited.
Tom couldn\'t find anybody to go with him, and so he went by himself.
Tom decided it wasn\'t his job to tell Mary about what John had done.
Tom didn\'t have enough time to answer all the questions on the test.
Tom must consider carefully whether he really wants a divorce or not.
Tom said he and his friends were planning to go camping next weekend.
Tom was at a distinct disadvantage against his much younger opponent.
